subject: Sony Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer earned the only break of the match in the opening game, lost just three points on his serve and beat Ivo Karlovic, 6-4, 7-6 (4), at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Roger Federer earned the only break of the match in the opening game, lost just three points on his serve and beat Ivo Karlovic, 6-4, 7-6 (4), at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
